name: Mercedes-Benz 190E 2.3 16
description: A timeless piece of 80's german engineering. The 190E provides a smooth ride with reliability on the road.

name: Mercedes-Benz W124 500E
description: The Mercedes-Benz 500 E (W124.036) is a high-performance version of the W124 sold by Mercedes-Benz from 1990 to 1995.

name: BMW E46 M3
description: The BMW M3 is a high-performance version of the BMW 3 Series, developed by BMW's in-house motorsport division, BMW M GmbH.

name: Porsche 911 Turbo 997.1
description: The Porsche 911 Turbo was unveiled at the 2006 Geneva Motor Show in Switzerland as the successor of the 996 Turbo.

name: BMW E39 M5
description: The E39 M5 is assuredly the finest example of the perfect balance between a comfortable and a sporty sedan: in other words, an automotive Yin and Yang.

name: Audi R8 Gen1
description: Audiâ€™s R8 is a useable, reliable, and easy-to-drive supercar. The first-generation R8 still looks fresh today alongside newer supercars.

name: Aston Martin DB9
description: The Aston Martin DB9 featured a V12 engine and weighed 25% less than its predecessor, the DB7, thanks to composite construction.

name: Nissan Silvia S15
description: The S15 Silvia includes aggressive styling inside and out, updating the previous Silvia styling in-line with modern car design trends.

name: Ferrari F40
description: An Italian classic from the 80's that is always in the spotlight wherever it shows up.
